name: VEE H AVIATION PTY LTD.
about: VEE H Aviation Pty Ltd, operating as Link Airways, is a reputable aviation entity with a rich history dating back to 1972 through its parent company, Corporate Air. Based at Brisbane Airport, Queensland, Link Airways specializes in scheduled regional passenger services across Australia, utilizing a fleet of Saab 340B Plus and Fairchild Metro 23 turboprop aircraft. Our flight school, integrated within the Laurel Highlands Aeronautical Academy framework, offers comprehensive training programs under Part 61 and Part 141 certifications. With experienced instructors and a diverse fleet, we provide personalized training schedules and a range of certifications from private pilot to commercial and multi-engine ratings. Our commitment to safety, efficiency, and excellence makes us an ideal choice for aspiring pilots and aviation professionals. We empower students to achieve their aviation goals with confidence and proficiency.
services:
["Brisbane FBO & Ground Handling
Canberra FBO & Ground Handling
Aircraft Management
Aerial Survey
Aircraft Maintenance
Flight Validation of TIFP"]
